SELECT
FROM t_warn_list n WHERE 1 = 1
AND n.fKeyword like '%${warnListCriteria.keyword}%'
AND n.fTitle like '%${warnListCriteria.title}%'
AND n.fUrl like '%${warnListCriteria.url}%'
ORDER BY n.fCreateTime DESC
